mapper.select: SELECT F.ORIGINALNAME PARTSPACKAGENAME, P.PARTSNAME, PT.PARTSTYPENAME, T.PARTNUMBER PARTSCODE, T.SOFTWAREVERSION VERSION, FI.ORIGINALNAME PACKAGENAME, CT.CARTYPENAME, P.NETWORKSEGMENTNAME, P.FUNCTIONID, P.PHYICALID, P.RESPONSEID FROM F_PARTSPACKAGE T LEFT JOIN F_PARTSBIGPACKAGE PBP ON T.FK_PARTSBIGPACKAGE_ID = PBP.PARTSBIGPACKAGE_ID AND PBP.ISDELETE = 1 LEFT JOIN F_FILE F ON T.FK_FILE_ID = F.FILE_ID AND F.ISDELETE = 1 LEFT JOIN F_FILE FI ON PBP.FK_FILE_ID = FI.FILE_ID AND FI.ISDELETE = 1 LEFT JOIN F_CARTYPE CT ON PBP.FK_CARTYPE_ID = CT.CARTYPE_ID AND CT.ISDELETE = 1 LEFT JOIN F_PARTS P ON T.FK_PARTS_ID = P.PARTS_ID AND P.ISDELETE = 1 LEFT JOIN F_PARTSTYPE PT ON P.FK_PARTSTYPE_ID = PT.PARTSTYPE_ID AND PT.ISDELETE = 1 WHERE T.ISDELETE = 1 AND T.PARTSPACKAGE_ID = #{partsPackageId}

SELECT T.PARTSPACKAGE_ID PARTSPACKAGEID, F.ORIGINALNAME PARTSPACKAGENAME, P.PARTSNAME, PT.PARTSTYPENAME, T.PARTNUMBER PARTSCODE, T.SOFTWAREVERSION VERSION, FI.ORIGINALNAME PACKAGENAME, CT.CARTYPENAME, T.FK_FILE_ID FILEID, ROWNUM ID FROM F_PARTSPACKAGE T LEFT JOIN F_PARTSBIGPACKAGE PBP ON T.FK_PARTSBIGPACKAGE_ID = PBP.PARTSBIGPACKAGE_ID AND PBP.ISDELETE = 1 LEFT JOIN F_FILE F ON T.FK_FILE_ID = F.FILE_ID AND F.ISDELETE = 1 LEFT JOIN F_FILE FI ON PBP.FK_FILE_ID = FI.FILE_ID AND FI.ISDELETE = 1 LEFT JOIN F_CARTYPE CT ON PBP.FK_CARTYPE_ID = CT.CARTYPE_ID AND CT.ISDELETE = 1 LEFT JOIN F_PARTS P ON T.FK_PARTS_ID = P.PARTS_ID AND P.ISDELETE = 1 LEFT JOIN F_PARTSTYPE PT ON P.FK_PARTSTYPE_ID = PT.PARTSTYPE_ID AND PT.ISDELETE = 1 WHERE T.ISDELETE = 1 AND (1=1)
